name: Fury Core
author: Theme Vision

sections.description:
1.0.6 – 02 March 2020

  • Updated some parts of plugin code.
  • Updated the plugin code to be compatible with Fury PRO plugin.
  • Minor admin menu page design changes.

1.0.5 – 25 November 2019

  • Updated some parts of plugin code.

1.0.4 – 11 September 2019

  • Minor change.

1.0.3 – 06 July 2018

  • Minor changes.

1.0.2 – 18 May 2018

  • Minor changes.

1.0.1 – 07 May 2018

  • Minor Changes

1.0 – 25 April 2018

  • Initial Release
